quote: What is the Grasshopper Adventure Series? It's everything that's right about bike riding as we know it! It's fun, it's camaraderie, it's mass start, it's gravel, and it's badass.

The King Ridge Grasshopper was my first enduro-style event, so I was excited to try something new. I had a group of friends to do it with and we powered up the timed segments at our own paces, then regrouped.

Always a proper battle at the Hoppers and today was no different. It was a slightly different style of racing with the segment format but it was a solid fight on each segment and the guys were all firing.
My first true gravel race is in the books! Low Gap, the opening stage of the Grasshopper Adventure Series, tested me in ways I didn't expect. üöµ‚ôÇÔ∏è The course was absolutely beautiful...

Each event will include a designated Team Zone where teams can set up tents, banners, and a home base. This is your spot to gather, support your riders, and bring your team's vibe to the day.

A portion of each registration is donated to organizations including the NorCal Interscholastic Cycling League, Redwood Trails Alliance, Adventure Therapy Foundation, Be Good Foundation, Redwood Forest Foundation, and various high school mountain bike teams.
